name: B. Build the Permutation
statement:
You are given three integers n, a, b. Determine if there exists a
permutation p_1, p_2,
ldots, p_n of integers from 1 to n, such that:There are exactly a
integers i with 2
le i
le n-1 such that p_{i-1} < p_i > p_{i+1} (in other words, there are
exactly a local maximums).There are exactly b integers i with 2
le i
le n-1 such that p_{i-1} > p_i < p_{i+1} (in other words, there are
exactly b local minimums).If such permutations exist, find any such
permutation.
